Directions: Cook pasta according to package directions.  Meanwhile, in a large nonstick skillet, cook the beef, onion and green pepper over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain.  Add the tomatoes, jalapenos, honey, chili powder and salt.  Reduce heat to low; cook, uncovered, for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.  Drain pasta; add to beef mixture.  Add sour cream; cook and stir until heated through (do not boil).
